cleaned_text: Welcome toThe Evolution New Earth Quantum Healing Heal Mind Body Soul & Awaken you're true Purpose and Power! Quantum Healer, Intuitive Empath & Enlightened Life Coach, BQH, Booking on Eastern Standard Time Heal Mind Body Soul & Awaken you're true Purpose and Power! Quantum Healer, Intuitive Empath & Enlightened Life Coach, BQH, Booking on Eastern Standard Time I am honored to be able to present Agarthan Ancient Healing and teachings to you all. You were guided to read this and to work with me nothing is coincidence. It is time for new beginnings and for your Divine rebirth... We are so blessed to be alive on earth to be a part of these prophetic times. I have great news! We are currently transitioning from old earth to New Earth on the 5th dimension. You were guided to me because you are a lightworker, star-seed, empath like myself who volunteered to help humanity ascend and evolve. People often think about saving the world but fail to realize first you must save yourself. Quantum Healing Hypnosis Therapy is a powerful form of Holistic healing which allows people to access a part of themselves that holds all the answers. Some people call this the over soul, super soul or Higher self. Quantum refers to universal energy also known as Chi or prana. So it is a form of energy and spiritual healing. A main part of my mission is to empower others to reach their highest potential and embody their higher self. Unlike when you visit a psychic medium who channels for you. You, your self becomes the channel and as the sessions progresses we eventually connect to the clients higher self. You may or may not see a past life in your first session it depends on the level of the clients abilities and if they are ready for that. With my specialized New Earth Quantum healing I created, clients are able to have a much clearer understanding of why things are the way they are — and to ultimately create change within themselves. I practice a evolution Of QHHT aligned to BQH Beyond Quantum Healing. My technique is an evolution of Dolores Cannon original technique. I work with your personal guides, Angels, ascended masters and Arch Angels. The other main difference in my Quantum technique is that my sessions achieve healings in half the time of traditional QHHT sessions. Going from 4 hours to 1.5-2 hours which is a more practical for our modern time. Quantum healing differs from Reiki and is longer lasting and more powerful because if specializes in subconscious reprogramming. Reaching deep into the depths of the soul. During a session we get to the root causes of youre pain and trauma. The body benefits from spiritual healing because trauma manifests in negative ways in our sacred body temple. I can attest to the powerful healing of quantum healing a long with many of my past clients. It helped save my life and be reborn. I suffered for years from auto immune issues, depression , suicide and PTSD. This therapy helped me finally heal myself. I was so inspired from its benefits I myself became a practitioner. I am truly a walking and talking miracle. If you only knew my story of the trials and trauma I have overcame. Youwill gert a chance soon as I have been working on a book about my healing and awakening journey along with divine keys and teachings from Agarthans and Ascended masters. I am so elated that many people are experimenting in holistic healing. Many have been trying to heal with out this key missing link! Sacred Plant medicine is becoming more and more available which is a great powerful traditonal medicine. There are 3 main keys to fully healing and awakening. Quantum healing is one of those sacred keys on your healing journey. The third one is integration and changing your lifestyle to embody the teachings of New Earth. Just as Yeshua aka Jesus, Buddha and other great Divine teachers have taught us. What to expect during in person session you may ask? I incorporate shamanic healing practices so you will be smudged with sacred sage and offered a special healing organic tea. I anoint your temple with holy oils and also use sacred incense. I play healing frequency during the regression and entire session. All sessions are recorded on zoom and you will receive access to view your session after wards. It is truly a transcendental experience. Some of my past clients have said its even better than 10 years of Clinical therapy. I combine ancient healing, Traditional medicine with Divine guidance and modern techniques which brought about an accelerated rate of healing. I assist you with whatever you are struggling with such as: depression, low self esteem, PTSD, addictions/ bipolar or grieving the loss of a loved one. Working with the Arch Angels and you're personal guides. Metaphysical practices you can receive transcendent healing. The soul guides us to the best way for you to overcome the Spiritual Blocks and heal your mind, body and soul the trinity, your whole being. Quantum healing differs from Reiki in that we focus on eliminating old negative programs and implant new positive super conscious programs. All hypnosis is self hypnosis so practice mediating the more the you do the easier it becomes it takes practice like with any skill. I offer in person clients additional healing with a Quantum healing Crystal bio mat. which includes four powerful energy therapies: red-light, Far inrared heat, crystal therapy, Negative ions that ground you. It's time to believe in miracles again! I am truly a modern Medicine woman. You can see more sessions from clients who decided to share some of their healing journey on my YouTube Denali Mind Body Soul. Another part of my mission is making quantum healing more affordable and accessible to others. I do this by offering very reasonable sessions at a lesser rate than most other Quantum healers. I also do this by offering group session. I aslo for those really struggling financially offer a lesser rate or donation based. Benefits of New Earth Quantum Healing * Subconscious Reprogramming * Soul Retrieval *Remove and release Energetic blocks *Past Life Regression or future progressions * Cleanse your Aura and balance chakras *Cut soul ties/Cords *Entity removal *Break Generational curses * Connect to Angelic realm and Ancestors *Divine Guidance *Overcome you're fears & anxiety *Inner Child healing For those that are financially burdened please express your situation and message me for special sliding scale pricing for those in great need.. Gaia Mother Earth shares a message to the world and a blessing from light language direct from source! Client sees a past life as a male adventurer who could communicate with animals and the earth. In this healing session she visits a life as a gypsy as a healer and learns about her galactic mission. as well. She is told she will be working with sacred plant medicine and will meet her twin flame soon and received divine healing. I am Honored to present this specialized trinity healing program developed by Arch Angel Gabriel and The Agarthans. Agartha is a legendary holy kingdom that is said to be located in the Earth's core. It is an inner earth civilization of highly advanced beings and ascended masters who dwell there.. This program is designed for lightworker, star seeds and empaths to truly quantum leap their spiritual evolution and awakening journey. The agarthans have protected mother Earth and its inhabitants for ages. They are here to help humanity transition to New Earth. What the majority are unaware of we have trauma from our past lives we carry in our soul . With all of our spiritual work the hardest parts are integration and evolving it into a dedicated practice. Those that are committed to their healing and ready for their initiation receive a total savings of $50 if you purchased sessions separately. I require a half down deposit to book and the other half 24-48 hours before your first scheduled session. I will send you a reminder and a link to pay the remainder. You may or may not be accepted into the program and it is all divinely ordained when and if you do get accepted. If you are not initially accepted please don't give up and d tr y again in 2-3 months. The space and participants are limited as well. This is a 3 month & 3 part program with one session a month. It includes firstly spiritual Coaching guiding. In this I determine where you are and develop a plan for you to prepare for your next step. Second session is a karmic release session. This is a one hour session to realign your soul and cut soul ties and help prepare you for full angelic session. lasting 1.5-2 hours. Lastly you receive a full New Earth quantum session. This program will help you get the most out of your healing sessions. each participant if accepted receives a electronic certificate of their initiation completion and lightworker official Denali Mind Body Soul Seal. There are no refunds if you fail to keep or reschedule your appointments Please respect my time an energy. We all have places in our life where we are blocked or have soul wounds that need healed. Removing these energetic blocks how humans are transcending and healing on all levels. What the majority are unaware of we have trauma from our past lives we carry in our soul . No matter how hard the past you can always begin again. In the Eastern traditions mental illness is a sign you are a powerful being / healer you only need a spiritual guide to awaken and master your powers. When repressed emotions and energy are healed and released, shadow work can result in sigificant spiritual growth, such as: assisting in accessing metaphysical gifts, twin flame reunion, and finding true love. When shadow energy is left unresolved, it can lead to spiritual, mental and physical illnesses. So why not heal those shadows /Trauma? There is hope and you are needed the world needs you. Consciousness is rising on the planet we are experiencing an awakening around the world. Let me guide you as you awaken. Societies illusions are becoming more apparent in this great revealing or Great Awakening!. The times of prophecy are here and Humanity is ascending to New earth. If you are new to the spiritual journey this can be overwhelming. Your soul wants a connection to the Divine. Until you align with your purpose the universe will be sending road blocks for you. If you are an Empath you will also continue to attract narcissists unless you heal yourself. You could experience misfortune, sudden illness , job loss etc. Life is full of blessings or lessons sometimes both but also opportunities, inspiration, synchronicities and it is my job to help you determine which opportunities are aligned to your True Self. In order to live the life you were born for and truly deserve thus awaken your true potential/ power. When you choose to manifest a dream, you need a plan to make it come true. You must have a high vibrational frequency to increase and unlock your grand manifestation. Through healing work blocks removed and allow more blessings to flow. Once weve clarified your intention, I will help you learn the Laws of Attraction and secrets to manifesting. I teach the number one mistake most people make that sabotages their manifesting.
